de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.extension
Interface IExtensionPointAdapter

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExtensionPointAdapter
public interface IExtensionPointAdapter

Extension adapter importing the register extensions using Java service providers.

Author:
Sven Krosse

Method Summary
 void disableExtensionPoint(java.lang.String extensionPointId)
          Disable the extension point with the given id if it exists

Method Detail

loadExtensionPoints

void loadExtensionPoints()
                         throws TMQLExtensionRegistryException
Loading all included extensions contained in the class path. The method uses a service provider of the interface IExtensionPoint to get all implementing extensions.

Throws:
TMQLExtensionRegistryException - thrown if a duplicated id will be found

getLanguageExtensions

java.util.Set<ILanguageExtension> getLanguageExtensions(java.lang.Class<? extends IExpression> expressionType)
Getter of a set of language extension applicable for the given expression type.

Parameters:
expressionType - the expression type
Returns:
a set of the language extensions or null

getLanguageExtensions

Getter of a set of language extension registered by the given extension point

Parameters:
point - the language extension
Returns:
a set of the language extensions or null

disableExtensionPoint
